about_the_game:
Take up your sword and shield and go on a quest with your friends!
QUEST TOGETHER is a social VR MMORPG where you can hang out and play together. As a new Rookie Hero, you get stationed in a small town that's been suffering from recent monster attacks. Take up quests and defend the town from monsters and help out with the villagers' requests. Meet other Heroes in town, make new friends, team up together for adventure, or partake in some PVP matches!

  • Enjoy online multiplayer in VR and make new friends, or invite your existing ones
  • Classic turn-based combat with up to 4 players per battle
  • Form 4-player parties and go on co-op quests together
  • For the competitive Heroes, enjoy a PVP mode in the arena to earn new gear and rewards
  • Customize your character with a variety of options and items
  • Unlock new weapons, armor sets, outfits and gear by playing
  • Strategize with your party by dividing roles: melee, ranged, support, etc.
  • Work your way up from small fry goblins to large bosses that won't go down without a fight
  • Integrated companion website so you can manage your account and keep tabs on your friends even when you're not playing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti / Radeon RX 470 or greater.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: [SteamVR: HTC Vive, Valve Index, Oculus Touch, HP Reverb G2] - [Oculus VR: Rift (S) or Quest 1/2 via Link]
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon R9 480 or greater.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Take up your sword and shield and go on a quest with your friends in QUEST TOGETHER, the classic turn-based VR MMORPG
